mapper.select: select ki.*,fs.name as gname,gems.name as pname from kjs_icbc_kk ki,assess_fs fs,assess_gems gems where ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id and ki.gems_id=gems.id and ki.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} order by ki.dt_add desc limit 1
select count(*) from kjs_icbc_kk where icbc_id>0 and bc_status=2
select kk.*,fs.name as gname,gems.name as pname from kjs_icbc_kk kk LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on kk.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on kk.gems_id=gems.id where kk.id=#{id}
select bc_status from kjs_icbc_kk where icbc_id=#{icbc_id} order by dt_add desc limit 1
select * from ( SELECT a.icbc_id as icbc_id,a.bc_status as bc_status,a.dt_add as dt_add FROM (SELECT * FROM kjs_icbc_kk ORDER BY dt_add DESC) as a GROUP BY icbc_id ) as b where b.icbc_id!=0
mapper.insert:
insert into kjs_icbc_kk( id, c_name, c_tel, cars_type, kp_price, dk_price, jrfw_price, dk_total_price, aj_type, aj_date, aj_bank, dk_lv, dz_type, sp_address, yw_address, add_time, up_time, icbc_id, md_add, md_edit, api_add, api_edit, sh_edit, result, result_time, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, dt_sub, dt_fin, gems_code, bc_status, query_type, gems_fs_id, gems_id, kk_car_stateid, kk_car_cityid, kk_loan_stateid, kk_loan_cityid, kk_kh, imgstep3_1, imgstep3_2, imgstep3_3, imgstep3_4, imgstep3_5, imgstep3_6, imgstep3_7, imgstep3_7s, pdfstep4_1, pdf_time, sfje, po_ysr, po_xl, po_xzdz, po_yzbm, po_gzdw, po_dwdz, po_zw, jjlxr_c_name, jjlxr_c_tel, jjlxr_jdrgx, jjlxr_xzdz, zdr_hyzk, zdr_grsr, zdr_jtsr, zdr_xl, zdr_jzzk, zdr_xzdz, zdr_yzbm, zdr_gzdw, zdr_dwdh, zdr_dwdz, zdr_dwxz, zdr_sshy, zdr_zy, zdr_zw, zdr_gznx, gjr1_hyzk, gjr2_hyzk, gjr1_xzdz, gjr2_xzdz, gjr1_yzbm, gjr2_yzbm, gjr1_gzdw, gjr2_gzdw, gjr1_dwdz, gjr2_dwdz, gjr1_yzdrgx, gjr2_yzdrgx, zdr_wsdz, po_wsdz, gjr1_wsdz, gjr2_wsdz
)values( #{id}, #{c_name}, #{c_tel}, #{cars_type}, #{kp_price}, #{dk_price}, #{jrfw_price}, #{dk_total_price}, #{aj_type}, #{aj_date}, #{aj_bank}, #{dk_lv}, #{dz_type}, #{sp_address}, #{yw_address}, #{add_time}, #{up_time}, #{icbc_id}, #{md_add}, #{md_edit}, #{api_add}, #{api_edit}, #{sh_edit}, #{result}, #{result_time}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{dt_sub}, #{dt_fin}, #{gems_code}, #{bc_status}, #{query_type}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{gems_id}, #{kk_car_stateid}, #{kk_car_cityid}, #{kk_loan_stateid}, #{kk_loan_cityid}, #{kk_kh}, #{imgstep3_1}, #{imgstep3_2}, #{imgstep3_3}, #{imgstep3_4}, #{imgstep3_5}, #{imgstep3_6}, #{imgstep3_7}, #{imgstep3_7s}, #{pdfstep4_1}, #{pdf_time}, #{sfje}, #{po_ysr}, #{po_xl}, #{po_xzdz}, #{po_yzbm}, #{po_gzdw}, #{po_dwdz}, #{po_zw}, #{jjlxr_c_name}, #{jjlxr_c_tel}, #{jjlxr_jdrgx}, #{jjlxr_xzdz}, #{zdr_hyzk}, #{zdr_grsr}, #{zdr_jtsr}, #{zdr_xl}, #{zdr_jzzk}, #{zdr_xzdz}, #{zdr_yzbm}, #{zdr_gzdw}, #{zdr_dwdh}, #{zdr_dwdz}, #{zdr_dwxz}, #{zdr_sshy}, #{zdr_zy}, #{zdr_zw}, #{zdr_gznx}, #{gjr1_hyzk}, #{gjr2_hyzk}, #{gjr1_xzdz}, #{gjr2_xzdz}, #{gjr1_yzbm}, #{gjr2_yzbm}, #{gjr1_gzdw}, #{gjr2_gzdw}, #{gjr1_dwdz}, #{gjr2_dwdz}, #{gjr1_yzdrgx}, #{gjr2_yzdrgx}, #{zdr_wsdz}, #{po_wsdz}, #{gjr1_wsdz}, #{gjr2_wsdz} )
mapper.update:
update kjs_icbc_kk
mid_edit=#{mid_edit}, dt_edit=#{dt_edit}, bc_status=#{bc_status}, kk_kh=#{kk_kh},
c_name=#{c_name}, c_tel =#{c_tel }, cars_type=#{cars_type}, kp_price=#{kp_price}, dk_price=#{dk_price}, jrfw_price=#{jrfw_price}, dk_total_price=#{dk_total_price}, aj_type=#{aj_type}, aj_date=#{aj_date}, aj_bank=#{aj_bank}, dk_lv=#{dk_lv}, dz_type=#{dz_type}, dt_sub=#{dt_sub}, dt_fin=#{dt_fin}, kk_car_stateid=#{kk_car_stateid}, kk_car_cityid=#{kk_car_cityid}, kk_loan_stateid=#{kk_loan_stateid}, kk_loan_cityid=#{kk_loan_cityid}, sfje=#{sfje}, po_ysr=#{po_ysr}, po_xl=#{po_xl}, po_xzdz=#{po_xzdz}, po_yzbm=#{po_yzbm}, po_gzdw=#{po_gzdw}, po_dwdz=#{po_dwdz}, po_zw=#{po_zw}, jjlxr_c_name=#{jjlxr_c_name}, jjlxr_c_tel=#{jjlxr_c_tel}, jjlxr_jdrgx=#{jjlxr_jdrgx}, jjlxr_xzdz=#{jjlxr_xzdz}, zdr_hyzk=#{zdr_hyzk}, zdr_grsr=#{zdr_grsr},
zdr_jtsr=#{zdr_jtsr}, zdr_xl=#{zdr_xl}, zdr_jzzk=#{zdr_jzzk}, zdr_xzdz=#{zdr_xzdz}, zdr_yzbm=#{zdr_yzbm}, zdr_gzdw=#{zdr_gzdw}, zdr_dwdh=#{zdr_dwdh},
zdr_dwdz=#{zdr_dwdz}, zdr_dwxz=#{zdr_dwxz}, zdr_sshy=#{zdr_sshy}, zdr_zy=#{zdr_zy}, zdr_zw=#{zdr_zw}, zdr_gznx=#{zdr_gznx}, gjr1_hyzk=#{gjr1_hyzk},
gjr2_hyzk=#{gjr2_hyzk}, gjr1_xzdz=#{gjr1_xzdz}, gjr2_xzdz=#{gjr2_xzdz}, gjr1_yzbm=#{gjr1_yzbm}, gjr2_yzbm=#{gjr2_yzbm}, gjr1_gzdw=#{gjr1_gzdw}, gjr2_gzdw=#{gjr2_gzdw},
gjr1_dwdz=#{gjr1_dwdz}, gjr2_dwdz=#{gjr2_dwdz}, gjr1_yzdrgx=#{gjr1_yzdrgx}, gjr2_yzdrgx=#{gjr2_yzdrgx}, zdr_wsdz=#{zdr_wsdz}, po_wsdz=#{po_wsdz}, gjr1_wsdz=#{gjr1_wsdz}, gjr2_wsdz=#{gjr2_wsdz}, kk_date=#{kk_date},
where id=#{id}
